abstract.p: The purpose of this manual is to provide a general overview of the features and user interface of the add-on for supplied with detailed initial setup and daily usage instructions.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.p: The primary intended audience are technical content developers with experience in development of XML-based documentation formats such as DITA or DocBook in and at least basic working knowledge of and distributed version control hosting platforms such as GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket.

section.title: Disclaimer
section.p: Explanations of the concepts behind as a distributed version control system and version control hosting platforms are not included. If you want to learn more about these topics, see the documentation provided by the specific software vendors.
